captions.text: The Story of Robert Davila.
You know who that is?
No, you don't
Because I do...
3 months ago I gave a KHUTBA in Forthfort...
I haven't been to that masjeed for 4 or 5 years.
And they invited me for some reason and I went
And I gave Khutba there
My khutba was about duaa
An Egyptian fellow comes up to me
A young man comes up to me and afterwords he said
Allah fulfilled my dua today
And I said whats your dua
He said my dua was that Nouman Ali khan sould meet Robert Davila.
I was like...
Are you Robert Davila?
He said nope, I am not Robert Davila
Robert Davila is my friend
But I think Allah full filling my dua
I was like... fire away! I wanna know
Robert Davila is a young man, who lives in a town 40 minutes past forforth...
He was a farmer, young guy
And he was hit by some short of genetic disorder that kiked him later on in his life
And he became paralyzed from the neck down
And he was, he is actually, he lives in a Nursing home
Most people in that Nursing home are 90 years, 100 years, really really old people.
And then, his room, he is paralyzed necked on, he is only 30 something years old.
That is in the nursing home. okay
And he is been that nursing home for the last 10 years.
His family got a computer for him that voice activated, so he can give vocie command put the headphones on
Google stuffs and search stuffs, so he can surf the web and find information.
In his room, in his room and by the way, strong christian family, the minister comes for prise to him every every you know every week and things like that.
And his best friend was in the bed next to him
One of his best friend, he became his best friend because he met him in the Nursing home
This person was also paralyzed and he needed a new liver. Okay
A liver transplant, He is waiting for a liver transplant.
And they use to talk about you know god and thinks like that all the time.
They were good friends.
Finally, his best friend got a call that there is a donor available for the liver.
So, He was so excited, He said, Robert I am gonna miss you, but I am going.
I have got, I have got a donor.
So, they take his friend and they go into the operation and his friend died in the operating table.
now his friend was also a christian.
But this friend, his sister took one of the amulets of his friends a crucifix and she gave it as a gift to Robert.
This is a reminder of your old buddy.
So he hung on the side of hospital bed.
Robert Davila lives a pretty decent life in there.
They use to take care, He is a happy guy
And one day he goes to sleep and he see a man in his dream.
The man says his name is Muhammad.
And he says, pointing at the crucifix.
God didn't send messengers so they would worship the messengers
God send messenger so that they could, you could worship God.
And Jesus was just a man, He walked in the Markets.
And He ate food.
He walked in the Markets and he ate food.
And the dream stopped.
He only knows the Jesus was just a man.
He knows their is a man that named Muhammad that said that to him.
He said that messengers came so poeple could worship God and not the messengers, this is all his know.
He starts googling Muhammad.
He finds Islam.
He take Sahada.
When He take Sahada, He wants to learn about the Quran.
So, He goes on the chat session and finds somebody needs to teach me Quran.
He finds a brother in Egypt that he gets together on skype to try to learn Arabic.
Learn the Arabic Alphabets.
When he learn the Arabic Alphabets, He learn to recite the Quran.
He memorised 10 Suras from his hospital bed.
Then he stats beginning to memorised the Quran.
And beginning to learn about this prophet.
But I need to understand the Quran.
So he starts googling, how to understand the Quran.
And for some reason he ends up on my  videos.
And he stats watching my staff.
And he watched almost everything.
And then he told and then, Here is other, here is the kiker.
In the nursing home there was a Egyptian fellow that use to come and do some repair, you know repair work.
The Egyptian fellow has his own awesome story.
The guy basically lost faith, he wasn't religious. The nearest masjeed to him 50 miles away.
So he didn't really go to Jummah much anymore.
But he felt to spiritual void, so started going to the Church, just to feel closer to Allah.
He has been raised Muslim. He goes to the Church, just to feel closer to Allah.
He is passing by Robert's room one day. He hear وَالْعَصْرِ إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
So He walks on to his room and said Robert, what you listening to.
Robert said nothing that was me.
And the guy said... you are Muslim?
Yeah, I became Muslim.
And now this friend is in shock.
How does Allah guide someone in the middle of Church Town USA.
In a Nursing home where the crucifix on the side of his bed, that he doesn't even have physical strength to move.
And the guy himself said, I wanna come back to Allah.
So he tells him about his you know the friend, he found online Nouman Ali Khan.
So the Egyptian fellow starts watching my videos.
And then he says I wish I could meet him oneday.
And he says okay. I will pray for you.
And after 5 years that Egyptian friend shows up at the same Masjeed, that I havn't been to in 4 years.
And after Jummah I says, I think Allah wants to fulfill my friends dua and my dua.
So I said, I think he does.
Lets go.
So I took few of us and went.
And we met with Robert.
We had a beautiful conversation with him.
and in sha Allah for Eid we gonna go to his Nursing home again.
They were actually nurse were pretty shock you all here to meet Robert.
yup yup...  Why do you wanna meet him
He is a inspiration
They say let me check if we can. they had to call the hospice administrator all the staff and then eventually let us in.
And Robert in shock.
And then I meet Rober, we talking. I was like, hai Robert I heard, you memorised some Suras
He says yeah. Can you recite one for me?
So, he recite Suratul Asr.
Not one of us wasn't crying. we are just in tears.
When somebody turns to Allah.
When somebody turns to Allah.
Don't worry about the means. guidance will come. Balance will come.
I wanna tell you some more about Robert because young guys are here.
Young guys like play basketball, young guys those are healty.
You guys that have ambition.
I told you whats his paralysed from where to where?
Neck down
He has a special wheel chair that has to hold pretty much every part of his body in place.
He can just sit in a wheel chair.
It holds his neck and holds every other part of his body, in place
Because he has no control over his limbs.
And he has to have a special van where the wheel chair locks in.
So that if he goes thru a bump or whatever he doesn't you know receive the shock.
So he made a request, he wants to go to the Friday prayer.
They didn't have the special van.
So they put him in a regular van.
And so he went to the regular van and few bumps and his spine got even more hurt.
He went to Jummah, he came back in excruciating pain.
And they said I am sorry Robert you are no longer able to sit in your wheel chair.
You gonna have to stay in your bed for the next 6 months at least.
If you see recovery then you can get back up again.
I met him in those in that spine, he already been in that bed for 3 months already.
And the reason he was in that bed, he went to Jummah Prayer.
And he told me about the Jummah prayer He said I have never felt more peace in my life when I was in that Masjeet.
And you know what I am gonna do brother Nouman?
When I can like sit on my chair again I wanna go to Jummah.
I wanna go to the Masjeed  because I have never felt like that before.
Here someone who has nothing but control over his mouth and his eyes
And he says I only finds peace in the Masjeed.
And here we are
I don't care what ideology, what school of thought what they talking about in the Masjeed, whats fithnas there.
I don't care, it still Allah's house, just go to pray
Don't go there to talk to people go there to talk to Allah.
Just go to talk to Allah.

You are... you are just going for you and Allah.
thats it.. Thats it
Other things will come but you are not going for them.
You are just going to there to find peace.
You will become different people.
If Allah can guide Robert Davila. Allah can guide everybody.
Then He said you know sometimes I wonder why Allah put in this position.
And then said to myself, what am I kidding. Allah has given me so much.
I am so greatful for already gave me.
And If this is the way he was gonna bring me to Islam, Its worth it.
So worth it.
You have Muslims that lose a little bit of help.
And they say why is Allah doing this to me.
And this man.
May few of thinking, now a days atheist argue because of suffering, there is no God.
If one man has a position in a position, I don't believe in God. If there is God why I would be in this position, It would be Robert Davila.
That guy would say I don't believe in God.
If there was one, why would I be in this mess.
And yeah, he is in this position. And I have never seen a face more noor.
Never, I have never seen a face that has more contentment on his. He is so satisfied with life.
He is so happy. He is just happy.
The last 7 or 8 khutba I have given are actually based on each one sentence per
Each on one sentence that he said in his conversation, was that profound
He is a teacher to me.
I counsider him a teacher, he is my Sheikh.
Somebody says who is your Sheikh, I says Robert Davila.
Really, is that a Pizza place? I says no no.
You know
The guidance is all around us.
You don't have to get worry about whats not there, there are planty there.
You know what Allah did for people of the Cave?
You know He even guided them in where to sleep.
You know he even guided them where they turn.
As the Sun was coming they turn away from it as the Sun came from other side they turn the other way.
Allah will guide you in your sleep.
When you make dua to him.
He will even guide you in your sleep.
Every toss and turn will be guided by Allah.
Can you imagine.
We shouldn't be sceptical Allah's guidance.
We shouldn't worry how am I gonna find balance, no thats Allah's job to guide you.
Your job is talk to him, your job is get sincere.
That is the message I have for you.
That is how we are gonna find balance.
Honestly, where you know and if
Once you do that, once you become sincere to Allah.
Allah will open doors, Allah will give you friends, Allah will give you teachers.
Allah will give you access to resources.
All of which are going to bring you closer and close and closer to him until the truth.
And make life better for the people around you.
I bear witness there is no God but Allah and Prophet Muhammad is his slave and messenger.

title: The story of Robert Davila ᴴᴰ | Nouman Ali Khan | Subtitled
